item.title: Skoki Loop
item.description: INTRO Date: 20XX-XX-XX to Location: Banff National Park Friends: Chris, Kat, Nick, Mel, John, Eric Day 1 - Fish Creek trailhead to Hidden Lake campground Day 2 - Hidden Lake campground to Merlin Meadows campground, day trip to Skoki Mountain Day 3 - Merlin Meadows campground to Fish Creek trailhead
